CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Opportunity__r.Account_Business_State_Province__c = "CA", ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Purchase_Options__c, "1.00 Out") ) || AND( Opportunity__r.Account_Business_State_Province__c = "NY", ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Purchase_Options__c, "1.00 Out") ) || AND( Opportunity__r.Account_Business_State_Province__c = "FL", ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Purchase_Options__c, "1.00 Out") ) || AND( Opportunity__r.Account_Business_State_Province__c = "GA", ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Purchase_Options__c, "1.00 Out") ) || AND( Opportunity__r.Account_Business_State_Province__c = "SD", ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Purchase_Options__c, "1.00 Out") ) || AND( Opportunity__r.Account_Business_State_Province__c = "KS", ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Purchase_Options__c, "1.00 Out") ), "A STATE DISCLOSURE FORM IS REQUIRED", NULL )
CustomField.label: Disclosure Language
